Package com.example.chinesecheckers.utils.Requests

Class GetUserProfileRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.chinesecheckers.utils.Requests.VolleyRequest
      • com.example.chinesecheckers.utils.Requests.GetUserProfileRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISimpleRequest
    public class GetUserProfileRequest
extends VolleyRequest
    Gets a user by the user ID using an HTTP request and then updates the necessary views in the current activity.

    Example:
    GetUserProfileRequest getUserById = new GetUserProfileRequest(TAG, ActiveUserProfile.this, user, profileUsername, profileRole, getFriendList);
    getUserById.setStatsViews(matchCount, winCount);
    getUserById.sendRequest(Request.Method.GET, Const.URL_GET_USER_BYID + user.getUID());

      • GetUserProfileRequest

        public GetUserProfileRequest​(java.lang.String tag,
                             android.app.Activity activity,
                             UserModel user,
                             android.widget.TextView username,
                             android.widget.TextView role,
                             android.widget.Button friendListButton)
        Constructs the HTTP request and necessary parts of the view that contain user information.
        Parameters:
        tag - - activity identifier
        activity - - current activity
        user - - logged in user
        username - - TextView that contains the user's username
        role - - TextView that contains the user's role
        friendListButton - - button that redirects to the user's friend list
